content:
# After inserting 5 additional units of coal, the Stone Furnace now has 8 units of coal available. However, it still indicates "NO INGREDIENTS TO SMELT," which means it is unable to process any more Copper Ore.

# The furnace has already produced 5 Copper Plates, but it seems that it does not have any Copper Ore left to continue smelting. 

# Let's check my inventory again to confirm the amount of Copper Ore I have. 
# If I have enough Copper Ore, I will need to insert it into the furnace to continue the smelting process.

print(f"Current Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking my inventory to see if I have Copper Ore available.
